backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing departments, semesters, subjects, resources, user profiles, and access control with admin/user permissions and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference or tooling purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes plus global background and border rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the SPA root element and main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/account/MyPrinci: UI card showing the user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Route guard handling login, admin-status checks, error states, and access-denied logic before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHelpS: Admin guide explaining how to upload or link study materials and offering organization tips.
frontend/src/components/admin/Department: UI for managing departments, semesters, and subjects with add, edit, and delete dialogs using catalog and admin mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResourceMa: Admin interface to add, edit, and delete resources, flattening department data and supporting URL or file uploads.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout and manages react-query state on authentication changes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with copyright, admin link, and external attribution link including dynamic app identifier.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, logo, login button, and mobile menu using a sheet component.
frontend/src/components/resources/EmptyS: Generic empty-state card showing an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Filter panel for resources with keyword search and department, semester, subject, and type selectors.
List view of resources showing metadata, type badge, optional context, and an open-link action.
frontend/src/features/admin/resourceMuta: Provides React Query mutations for adding, editing, and removing resources, invalidating department data on success.
frontend/src/features/admin/structureMut: Defines mutations for managing departments and subjects via the actor, refreshing department queries after changes.
frontend/src/features/admin/useAdminStat: Fetches and exposes admin status using the actor and Internet Identity with React Query.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSea: Implements resource filtering based on keyword, hierarchy fields, and derived resource type.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: Fetches all departments via the actor with React Query when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/resourceType.ts: Determines a resource type by inspecting its title and URL for category keywords.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page with tabs for resource and structure management, wrapped in an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Browse page for navigating departments, semesters, and subjects using fetched catalog data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying hero content, feature list, and a principal box when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Search interface that flattens department data and filters resources based on keyword and multiple select filters.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Loads a specific subjectâ€™s resources, shows breadcrumbs, and displays either a resource list or an empty state.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Utility for copying text to the clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/utils/semesterSort.ts: Sorts semester objects by numeric value extracted from their names, with string fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including sessionStorage-backed retrieval.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing admin-access backend requirements and tracking new feature requests.
